General.Name: SBI Insurance Group Co. Ltd
General.Description: SBI Insurance Group Co., Ltd. provides various insurance products in Japan. It operates through Non-life Insurance Business, Life Insurance Business, and Small-amount Short-term Insurance Business segments. The Non-life Insurance Business segment offers automobile, cancer, and fire insurance. The Life Insurance Business segment offers group credit life, group credit disability, term, disability, and whole life medical insurance. The Small-amount Short-term Insurance Business segment offers death, medical, pet, vehicle, and earthquake compensation insurance, as well as insurance for rental housing and tenants. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. SBI Insurance Group Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of SBI Holdings, Inc.
